content:
The Land Forces units continue to defeat the invaders in the Bakhmut and Avdiivsky directions.

About thisreportThe Armed Forces of the Armed Forces, reports the Armyinform.

The first shot hit one tank that moved in the column. When the other two tanks tried to flee, the Ukrainian litters again hit the occupiers' technique and brought out the rest of the racists from the structure.

"Tanks, combat armored vehicles, positions and staff of the enemy have been destroyed - our warriors hit the enemy, leveling his attempts to advance and secured in the East," the message reads.

Formerly ArmyInformreportedthat in the defense forces reported that the enemy would unsuccessfully storm on the Left Bank of the Dnieper, tactical aviation is beaten by the robot.
title: The Armed Forces of Ukraine "fried" a lot of enemy equipment and personnel in the Bakhmut and Avdiivka directions
description: This was reported by the Armed Forces Land Forces, reports the Armyinform. The first shot ...
author: Army Inform
